scripts.export:cards: node scripts/svg_to_png.mjs public/business-card-front.svg public/business-card-front.png 1050 && node scripts/svg_to_png.mjs public/business-card-back.svg public/business-card-back.png 600
scripts.export:cards:bleed: node scripts/svg_to_png.mjs public/business-card-front.svg public/business-card-front-bleed.png 1085 && node scripts/svg_to_png.mjs public/business-card-back.svg public/business-card-back-bleed.png 635
scripts.export:social: node scripts/svg_to_png.mjs public/social/facebook-profile.svg public/social/facebook-profile.png 1024 && node scripts/svg_to_png.mjs public/social/facebook-cover.svg public/social/facebook-cover.png 1702
